EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #1.2020 Dealer Update #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - January 30, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | January 2020 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2020-01 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-01-Rev-A_ADS-B-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-with-Primus-II-RM-855.pdf]]> ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-855 - 2020-02 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-02-Rev-A_ADS-B-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-with-Primus-II-RM-850.pdf]]>Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-02-Rev-A_ADS-B-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-with-Primus-II-RM-850.pdf]]> ADS-B Upgrade for Business Aircraft with Primus II RM-850 - 2020-03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-03-Rev-A_CD-830-Control-Display-Unit-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]>Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-03-Rev-A_CD-830-Control-Display-Unit-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> CD-830 Control Display Unit for Business Aircraft - 2020-22 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-22-Rev-A-OEM-Laseref-IV-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Laseref IV Upgrade for OEM Affiliated Service Centers - 2020-23 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-23-Rev-A--Laseref-IV-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Laseref IV Upgrade Retrofit Program - 2020-25 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-25-Rev-A-JetWave-Satellite-Communications-System-for-Business-Aviation.pdf]]> JetWave Satellite Communications System for Business Aviation
- 2020-40 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-40-Laseref-IV-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft---All-Dealers.pdf]]> Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft for All Dealers
Dealers can find 2020 sales bulletins on our website under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
